extendedInfo.description: Soccer Rotation, Substations, Coaching, Equal Play Time, Playing time If you have ever coached soccer team its chaotic enough trying to make sure the kids are in the right positions. You shouldnât have to worry if everyone is getting equal playing time. The Soccer Rotation Station will help to make sure that the kids are in the right position at the same time making sure that you donât have one kid spending too much on the sideline! The app vibrates and blows a whistle at you when itâs getting time to rotate your players, you then line them up and tell them who they are going in for and you wait. When the time is right, you send them in while pressing the rotate button and their off! Define Your own Positions Switch Positions (New) Set your own formations (5 vs 5, 6 vs 6 and so on) Substitute Players (New) Mark Goals and Assists for each player Add Blocks and Steals (New) Define your own positions Create your team and add your players on a website (By directional sync coming soon). (New) Keep track of opposing teamâs goals Brighter Clock (New) Game statistics with a summary of each playerâs âon fieldâ time including goals and assists. Rate Players so that you donât have all of the weak players on the field at the same time (New) (MANY FEATURES LISTED HERE ARE FOR THE PAID VERSION OF THE APP!)

reviews.title: Excellent Start, but Missing Critical Component!
reviews.comment: Near worthless unless the user can designate the position for each player so the substitution pulls from the designated position,  and not randomly. The other features are a good foundation, but I will not pay for this app with that feature missing.  If/When added,  I will gladly pay.
reviews.author: jeremy tellex

reviews.title: Its just ok
reviews.comment: Will not let me take goalie out of rotation without requiring a player name, then if i pick a player name, it stays on goalie position and wont let me remove it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good, great if we could do 4 players
reviews.comment: Here in Aus for 5 year olds we play teams of 6 with 4 on at a time. Any chance of 4 a side.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works great, we use it for the kids soccer team! No issues and developer is quick to reply.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app Must buy.
reviews.comment: Loved the app. Will buy full version. Hard to find apps that work to make your life easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: You can do nothing with this app. You cannot even set up a 4v4 rotation. Every time you try something, it reminds you that its the free version, and that all you can do is rotate players. Except, you can\'t even do that. Not a good way to sell the full version.
reviews.author: Andrew Krause
